Prop.Name: App Key
Prop.Description: Property App Key as specified in the App Settings page on JPush's website

Prop.Name: Master Secret
Prop.Description: Property Master Secret key used by the REST API as specified in the App Settings page on JPush's website

Prop.Name: Channel
Prop.Description: Property specifies channel for the application package, for the convenience of sub-channel statistics

Prop.Name: APNs for production
Prop.Description: Property indicates whether the APNs certificate for Production or Development should be used.

Prop.Name: NDK ABI Filters
Prop.Description: ABIs that will be included in APK
